name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Freelance Angular Developer with a deep expertise in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **Sass**, committed to delivering high-quality, user-centric applications. Proficient in **RxJS**, **Angular Material**, **Tailwind CSS**, and state management frameworks like **NgRx** and **Akita**. Well-versed in modern development tools including **Git**, and methodologies such as **WCAG** for accessibility. With a proven track record in enhancing user interfaces through **Storybook** and innovative design patterns, I bring 9+ years of experience in crafting scalable applications that meet the diverse needs of clients across various sectors, including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Angular** and **TypeScript** to develop dynamic web applications, improving performance and user engagement by achieving a **40%** increase in loading speed.
Implemented state management solutions using **NgRx** and **Akita**, enhancing data flow consistency across large applications with a **50%** reduction in state management bugs.
Designed responsive UI components with **Angular Material** and **Tailwind CSS**, aligning with **WCAG** standards to ensure accessibility for all users, leading to a **25%** increase in user satisfaction ratings.
Integrated real-time data handling with **RxJS**, resulting in seamless user interactions and a **30%** reduction in data-fetching delays.
Developed modular components using **Sass** to maintain project scalability and facilitate easier stylesheet management, which improved developer efficiency by **20%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Git** for version control, streamlining code reviews and enhancing collaborative coding practices.
Employed **Storybook** for UI development, ensuring consistent design practices and reducing the time taken for UI component testing by **35%**. 
Applied best coding practices and Agile methodologies, contributing to project success and timely deliveries.

Utilized **Angular 9**, **TypeScript**, and **HTML** to develop responsive web applications, ensuring compliance with **WCAG** standards for accessibility.
Integrated **RxJS** for handling asynchronous data, improving application efficiency and user experience.
Implemented state management using **NgRx** and **Akita**, enhancing data flow and responsiveness in applications, leading to a 15% reduction in load times.
Designed user interfaces with **Angular Material** and **Sass**, resulting in a more cohesive and modern design that improved user engagement by 30%.
Collaborated with teams using **Git** for version control, maintaining an organized workflow and ensuring project scalability.
Leveraged **Tailwind CSS** for styling enhancements, reducing CSS file size by 40% and improving loading speeds.
Employed **Signals** for streamlined event handling, enhancing component communication throughout applications.
Developed reusable components using **Storybook**, reducing development overhead and ensuring consistent UI elements across the platform.

• Developed responsive frontend applications using **Angular** (versions 12 and 13), incorporating **TypeScript**, **RxJS**, and **HTML** to enhance user experience.
• Utilized **Sass** and **Tailwind CSS** for efficient styling, improving aesthetic and functional aspects by 30%.
• Implemented state management solutions using **NgRx** and **Akita**, maintaining performance across over **9** modules of the application.
• Collaborated with UI/UX designers using **Storybook**, resulting in a cohesive design implemented across a project with **100+** components.
• Ensured compliance with **WCAG** standards for accessibility, achieving a compliance score of **95%**.
• Managed version control and collaborative development using **Git**, facilitating contributions from **5** team members across **3** projects.
